description:
We add the block-migration option If we need to operate block live migration.

However, the block-migration argument is no more used after conductor task codes.

Now, The migrate_data object replaces block-migration flags.

This useless argument needs to be removed from compute manager flows.
title: useless block-migration argument of live-migration

comments.content:
We add the block-migration option If we need to operate block live migration.

However, the block-migration argument is no more used after conductor task codes.

Now, The migrate_data object replaces block-migration flags.

This useless argument needs to be removed from compute manager flows.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yongiman

comments.content:
There are several patches for that on review already, and I think it doesn't need a bug for that.
No need to backport.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tdurakov
